name: RM-Methods Projects
description:
RM-Methods is an Unreal Engine 4 Plugin editor expanding the capabilities of the actual POM shader on Unreal Engine.

Unreal Engine Marketplace Plugin Page

The plugin can generate an special Texture Map to use on the shaders.

Principally intended to work on mobile Platforms without sacrifice performance, also can deliver a good and powerful performance on other Platforms more advanced.

This is a set of downloadable projects and demos using the Unreal Engine Plugin RM-Methods.
